description.brazilian: Pesque seu primeiro peixe.
description.english: Catch your first fish.
description.french: Attrape ton premier poisson.
description.german: Fange deinen ersten Fisch.
description.italian: Prendi il tuo primo pesce.
description.japanese: 初めて魚を釣る。
description.koreana: 러스티의 낚시용품점 벽을 장식할 커다란 월아이를 낚아 올리세요.
description.spanish: Captura tu primer pez.
description.tchinese: 釣到你的第一條魚。
description.turkish: İlk balığını yakala.

description.brazilian: Compre e melhore tudo na loja.
description.english: Buy and upgrade everything in the shop.
description.french: Achetez et améliorez tout dans la boutique.
description.german: Kaufe und verbessere alles im Laden.
description.italian: Acquista e potenzia tutto nel negozio.
description.japanese: ショップ内のすべてを購入し、アップグレードしよう。
description.koreana: 상점에 있는 모든 물건을 구매하고 업그레이드하세요.
description.russian: Купи и улучшай всё в магазине.
description.schinese: 购买并升级店铺里的所有物品。
description.spanish: Compra y mejora todo en la tienda.
description.tchinese: 購買並升級商店裡的所有東西。
description.turkish: Mağazadaki her şeyi satın al ve yükselt.

description.brazilian: Descubra todas as espécies de peixes.
description.english: Discover every species of fish.
description.french: Découvrez toutes les espèces de poissons.
description.german: Entdecke jede Fischart.
description.italian: Scopri ogni specie di pesce.
description.japanese: 魚を全種発見する
description.spanish: Descubre todas las especies de pez.
description.tchinese: 發現所有魚種。
description.turkish: Her türden balığı keşfet.

displayName.italian: La persona che sussurrava ai pesci

description.brazilian: Pesque e solte um peixe de cada espécie.
description.english: Catch and release one of every fish species.
description.french: Attrapez et relâchez un poisson de chaque espèce.
description.german: Fange und lasse von jeder Fischart ein Exemplar wieder frei.
description.italian: Cattura e libera un esemplare per ogni specie.
description.japanese: 魚を全種発見して、リリースする
description.koreana: 모든 어종을 한 마리씩 잡은 다음 풀어주세요.
description.russian: Поймать и выпустить по одной рыбе каждого вида.
description.schinese: 每个鱼种钓获并放生一条鱼。
description.spanish: Captura y suelta cada una de las especies de pez.
description.tchinese: 完成所有魚種的釣獲與放生。
description.turkish: Tüm balık türlerinden bir tane tutup serbest bırak.

description.brazilian: Faça carinho no seu companheiro 10 vezes em uma sessão.
description.english: Pat your companion 10 times in one session.
description.french: Caresser 10 fois votre compagnon en une session.
description.german: Streichle deinen Gefährten 10 Mal in einer Sitzung.
description.italian: Coccola il compagno 10 volte in una sessione.
description.japanese: 1セッションで10回「パートナー」を愛でる
description.russian: Погладить своего компаньона 10 раз за одну игру.
description.schinese: 在同一遊戲中撫摸你的動物夥伴 10 次。
description.spanish: Acaricia a tu compañero 10 veces en una sesión.
description.tchinese: 在同一場遊戲中摸摸你的夥伴狗狗 10 次。
description.turkish: Yol arkadaşını tek seferde 10 kez okşa.

description.brazilian: Mude o horário do dia.
description.english: Change the time of day.
description.french: Changer l'heure de la journée.
description.german: Ändere die Tageszeit.
description.italian: Cambia l'ora del giorno.
description.japanese: 時間帯を変える
description.spanish: Cambia la hora del día.
description.tchinese: 更改時間。
description.turkish: Günün vaktini değiştir.

description.brazilian: Atraia 5 peixes até sua isca ao mesmo tempo.
description.english: Attract 5 fish to your lure at the same time.
description.french: Attirer 5 poissons d'un coup à votre leurre.
description.german: Ziehe 5 Fische gleichzeitig mit deinem Köder an.
description.italian: Attira 5 pesci all'esca contemporaneamente.
description.japanese: 同時に1つのルアーへ5匹の魚を引き寄せる
description.russian: Подманить на свою приманку сразу 5 рыб.
description.schinese: 同时吸引5条鱼吞下你的鱼饵。
description.spanish: Atrae a 5 peces a tu cebo al mismo tiempo.
description.tchinese: 同時吸引 5 隻魚追你的餌。
description.turkish: Yemine aynı anda 5 balık çek.

description.brazilian: Pesque um peixe tamanho L sem olhar debaixo da superfície da água.
description.english: Catch an L sized fish without looking under the water surface.
description.french: Attraper un poisson de taille L sans regarder sous la surface de l'eau.
description.german: Fange einen Fisch in L-Größe ohne unter die Wasseroberfläche zu gucken.
description.italian: Cattura un pesce di taglia L senza guardare sotto la superficie.
description.japanese: 水中を見ずに、Lサイズの魚を釣り上げる
description.koreana: 물속을 보지 않고 L 크기의 물고기를 잡으세요.
description.russian: Поймать рыбу размера L, не заглядывая под воду.
description.schinese: 在不从水面以下观察的情况下，钓上一条L尺寸的鱼。
description.spanish: Captura un pez de tamaño L sin mirar bajo la superficie del agua.
description.tchinese: 在不看水下的情況下，釣上一尾 L 尺寸的魚。
description.turkish: Suyun altına bakmadan L boyutunda bir balık yakala.

description.brazilian: Pesque um peixe de peso de troféu de todas as espécies.
description.english: Catch a trophy weight fish for all species.
description.french: Pêcher un spécimen de chaque espèce digne d'un trophée.
description.german: Fange einen Fisch mit Trophäengewicht für alle Arten.
description.italian: Cattura un esemplare da trofeo per tutte le specie.
description.japanese: 全種のトロフィー級を釣り上げる
description.koreana: 모든 어종의 트로피 무게 물고기를 잡으세요.
description.russian: Выловить по рыбе трофейного веса всех видов.
description.schinese: 捕获所有鱼种的奖杯级鱼。
description.spanish: Pesca un pez de peso de trofeo de todas las especies.
description.tchinese: 釣到所有魚種的獎盃級魚體重。
description.turkish: Tüm türlerden kupa ağırlığında bir balık yakala.

description.brazilian: Pegue um picão-verde grande o suficiente para ganhar um lugar na parede da loja de equipamentos de pesca do Rusty.
description.english: Land a big enough Walleye to get on the wall in Rusty's tackle shop.
description.french: Attrapez un doré jaune assez gros pour finir sur le mur du magasin de Rusty.
description.german: Fange einen Zander, der groß genug für die Wand in Rustys Anglerladen ist.
description.italian: Cattura un lucioperca abbastanza grande da essere esposto nel negozio di esche di Rusty.
description.japanese: ラスティの釣具店の壁に飾れるぐらい大きなウォールアイを釣り上げる。
description.koreana: 러스티의 낚시용품점 벽을 장식할 커다란 월아이를 낚아 올리세요.
description.russian: Поймать достаточно большого судака, чтобы его можно было повесить на стену в магазине Расти.
description.schinese: 钓到一条足够大的玻璃梭鲈，就能在拉斯蒂渔具店的墙上展示。
description.spanish: Pesca una lucioperca americana lo bastante grande como para estar en la pared de la tienda de Rusty.
description.tchinese: 釣到夠大的美洲鱸，就能掛在拉斯提釣具店的展示牆！
description.turkish: Rusty'nin balık avı malzemeleri dükkânının duvarına asılacak kadar büyük bir Amerikan Levreği yakala.

description.brazilian: Pesque a Carpa Comum de peso de troféu.
description.english: Catch the trophy weight Common Carp.
description.french: Pêcher la plus grosse carpe commune.
description.german: Fange den Karpfen mit Trophäengewicht.
description.italian: Cattura una carpa comune da trofeo.
description.japanese: トロフィー級のコイを釣り上げる
description.spanish: Pesca a la carpa común de peso de trofeo.
description.tchinese: 釣到獎盃級的鯉魚。
description.turkish: Kupa ağırlığında Sıradan Sazan yakala.

description.brazilian: Pesque o Lúcio de peso de troféu.
description.english: Catch the trophy weight Northern Pike.
description.french: Pêcher le plus gros brochet.
description.german: Fange den Hecht mit Trophäengewicht.
description.italian: Cattura un luccio da trofeo.
description.japanese: トロフィー級のノーザンパイクを釣り上げる
description.spanish: Pesca al lucio de peso de trofeo.
description.tchinese: 釣到獎盃級的北方梭魚。
description.turkish: Kupa ağırlığında Turna Balığı yakala.

description.english: Catch the trophy weight Muskie.
description.french: Pêcher le plus gros maskinongé.
description.german: Fange die Muskellunge mit Trophäengewicht.
description.italian: Cattura un muskellunge da trofeo.
description.japanese: トロフィー級のマスキーを釣り上げる
description.spanish: Pesca al lucio muskallonga de peso de trofeo.
description.tchinese: 釣到獎盃級的北美狗魚。
description.turkish: Kupa ağırlığında Çizgili Turna Balığı yakala.

description.brazilian: Pesque o Lota-do-rio de peso de troféu.
description.english: Catch the trophy weight Burbot.

description.german: Fange die Quappe mit Trophäengewicht.
description.italian: Cattura una bottatrice da trofeo.
description.japanese: トロフィー級のバーボットを釣り上げる
description.spanish: Pesca a la lota de peso de trofeo.
description.tchinese: 釣到獎盃級的江鱈。
description.turkish: Kupa ağırlığında Tatlı Su Gelinciği yakala.

description.brazilian: Pesque o Achigã de Boca Larga de peso de troféu.
description.english: Land the trophy weight Largemouth Bass.
description.french: Pêcher la plus grosse perche noire.
description.german: Fange den Großen Schwarzbarsch mit Trophäengewicht.
description.italian: Cattura un persico trota da trofeo.
description.japanese: トロフィー級のラージマウスバスを釣り上げる
description.spanish: Pesca a la perca atruchada de peso de trofeo.
description.tchinese: 釣到獎盃級的大嘴黑鱸。
description.turkish: Kupa ağırlığında Büyük Ağızlı Levrek yakala.

description.brazilian: Pesque a Truta-de-lago de peso de troféu.
description.english: Land the trophy weight Lake Trout.
description.french: Pêcher la plus grosse truite grise.
description.german: Fange die Seeforelle mit Trophäengewicht.
description.italian: Cattura un salmerino di lago da trofeo.
description.japanese: トロフィー級のレイクトラウトを釣り上げる
description.spanish: Pesca a la trucha lacustre de peso de trofeo.
description.tchinese: 釣到獎盃級的湖鱒。
description.turkish: Kupa ağırlığında Göl Alabalığı yakala.

description.brazilian: Pesque a Truta-garganta-cortada de peso de troféu.
description.english: Land the trophy weight Cutthroat Trout.
description.french: Pêcher la plus grosse truite fardée.
description.german: Fange die Cutthroat-Forelle mit Trophäengewicht.

description.japanese: トロフィー級のカットスロートトラウトを釣り上げる
description.spanish: Pesca a la trucha degollada de peso de trofeo.
description.tchinese: 釣到獎盃級的割喉鱒。
description.turkish: Kupa ağırlığında Kırmızı Boğazlı Alabalık yakala.

description.french: Pêcher le plus gros saumon de l'Atlantique.
description.german: Fange den Atlantischen Lachs mit Trophäengewicht.
description.italian: Cattura un salmone atlantico da trofeo.
description.japanese: トロフィー級のアトランティックサーモンを釣り上げる

description.tchinese: 釣到獎盃級的大西洋鮭。
description.turkish: Kupa ağırlığında Atlantik Somonu yakala.

description.french: Pêcher le plus gros saumon royal qui a échappé au vieux Hank.
description.german: Fange den verlorenen Königslachs mit Trophäengewicht vom alten Hank.
description.italian: Cattura il salmone reale da trofeo di Hank.
description.japanese: トロフィー級のキングサーモンを釣り上げる

description.russian: Поймать потерянного Старым Хэнком Короля Лососей трофейного веса.
description.schinese: 捕获老汉克错失的奖杯级帝王鲑。
description.spanish: Pesca al salmón real de peso de trofeo del viejo Hank.
description.tchinese: 釣起漢克遺失的獎盃級帝王鮭。
description.turkish: İhtiyar Hank'in izini kaybettiği, kupa ağırlığındaki Kral Somonu yakala.

description.italian: Cattura un lingcod da trofeo.

description.tchinese: 釣到獎盃級的蛇鱈。
description.turkish: Kupa ağırlığında Ling Morinası yakala.

description.french: Pêcher le plus gros flétan de l'Atlantique.
description.german: Fange den Pazifischen Heilbutt mit Trophäengewicht.
description.italian: Cattura un ippoglosso pacifico da trofeo.
description.japanese: トロフィー級のタイヘイヨウオヒョウを釣り上げる
description.schinese: 捕获奖杯级太平洋比目鱼。

description.turkish: Kupa ağırlığında Pasifik Pisi Balığı yakala.

description.tchinese: 釣到獎盃級的條紋鱸。

description.french: Pêcher la plus grosse barbue de rivière.

description.turkish: Kupa ağırlığında Kanal Kedi Balığı yakala.

displayName.japanese: 閉じこめられし伝説の大物

description.brazilian: Pesque o Esturjão Branco de peso de troféu.
description.english: Land the trophy weight White Sturgeon.
description.french: Pêcher le plus gros esturgeon blanc.
description.german: Erreiche das Trophäengewicht für den Weißen Stör.
description.italian: Cattura uno storione bianco da trofeo.
description.japanese: トロフィー級のシロチョウザメを釣り上げる
description.spanish: Pesca al esturión blanco de peso de trofeo.
description.tchinese: 釣起獎盃級白鱘。
description.turkish: Kupa ağırlığında Beyaz Mersin Balığı yakala.

description.brazilian: Perca um peixe após lutar com ele por 2 minutos.
description.english: Lose a fish after fighting it for 2 minutes.
description.french: Perdre un poisson après une lutte acharnée de 2 minutes.
description.german: Verliere einen Fisch, nachdem du 2 Minuten lang um ihn gekämpft hast.
description.italian: Perdi un pesce dopo aver lottato per 2 minuti.
description.japanese: 2分間の格闘の後、魚を逃す
description.schinese: 在与一条鱼拉锯2分钟后让它跑掉。
description.spanish: Pierde un pez tras luchar con él durante 2 minutos.
description.tchinese: 在奮戰 2 分鐘後還是讓魚跑了。
description.turkish: Bir balığı, çekmek için 2 dakika uğraştıktan sonra kaybet.

description.brazilian: Pesque um peixe novamente após soltá-lo.
description.english: Catch a fish again after releasing it.
description.french: Attraper un poisson après l'avoir relâché.
description.german: Fange einen Fisch, nachdem du ihn freigelassen hast.
description.italian: Cattura un pesce dopo averlo liberato.
description.japanese: リリースした魚をもう一度釣り上げる
description.russian: Поймать еще раз рыбу, отпущенную ранее.
description.schinese: 在放生一条鱼后再次捕获它。
description.spanish: Vuelve a pescar un pez después de liberarlo.
description.tchinese: 再次釣起你曾經放生的魚。
description.turkish: Bir balığı, serbest bıraktıktan sonra tekrar yakala.

description.brazilian: Pegue um peixe com outro peixe.
description.english: Catch a fish with another fish.
description.french: Attraper un poisson avec un autre poisson.
description.german: Fange einen Fisch mit einem anderen Fisch.
description.italian: Cattura un pesce con un altro pesce.
description.japanese: 魚で魚を釣り上げる
description.schinese: 用一条鱼捕获另一条鱼。
description.spanish: Pesca un pez con otro pez.
description.tchinese: 用一條魚釣到另一條魚。
description.turkish: Bir balığı, başka bir balıkla yakala.

description.brazilian: Faça um buraco no gelo.
description.english: Drill a hole in the ice.
description.french: Percer un trou dans la glace.
description.german: Bohre ein Loch im Eis.
description.italian: Pratica un foro nel ghiaccio.
description.japanese: 氷に穴を開ける
description.spanish: Haz un agujero en el hielo.
description.tchinese: 在冰面上鑽一個洞。
description.turkish: Buzda bir delik aç.

description.brazilian: Pegue 12 peixes do mesmo buraco.
description.english: Catch 12 fish from the same hole.
description.french: Attraper 12 poissons au même trou.
description.german: Fange 12 Fische aus demselben Loch.
description.italian: Cattura 12 pesci dallo stesso buco.
description.japanese: ひとつの穴から魚を12匹釣り上げる
description.schinese: 从同一个冰洞中捕获12条鱼。
description.spanish: Pesca 12 peces en el mismo agujero.
description.tchinese: 在同一個冰洞裡釣到12條魚。
description.turkish: Aynı delikte 12 balık tut.

description.brazilian: Pegue o Lúcio-tigre de peso de troféu.
description.english: Land the trophy weight Tiger Muskie.
description.french: Pêcher le plus gros maskinongé tigré.
description.german: Fange den Tigerhecht mit Trophäengewicht.
description.italian: Cattura un muskellunge tigrato da trofeo.
description.japanese: トロフィー級のタイガーマスキーを釣り上げる
description.spanish: Captura al tigre muskallonga de peso de trofeo.
description.tchinese: 釣到獎盃級的虎紋狗魚。
description.turkish: Kupa ağırlığında Çizgili Turna Balığı yakala.

description.brazilian: Capture todos os tamanhos de todas as espécies.
description.english: Catch every size of every species.
description.french: Pêcher toutes les tailles de chaque espèce.
description.german: Fange jede Art in jeder Größe.
description.italian: Pesca ogni grandezza di ogni specie.
description.japanese: すべての魚種のすべてのサイズを釣り上げる。
description.russian: Поймайте рыбу всех видов и размеров.
description.schinese: 捕获所有鱼种的各种体型。
description.spanish: Pesca todos los tamaños de todas las especies.
description.tchinese: 捕獲所有魚種的各種體型。
description.turkish: Her türden tüm boyutlarda balık tut.
